Watch: Modi vs Trump: Politics and Economy amid tariff war | Talking Politics
description: In this episode of Talking Politics, we speak to Dr. Jaijit Bhattacharya, Founder & President of the Centre for Digital Economy Policy Research, on Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs and their impact on India. The discussion explores whether these policies could push India towards the ‘Atmanirbhar’ route, the consequences for domestic industries and global supply chains, and how India can navigate this shifting trade landscape. Will Trump’s tariffs redefine India’s economic strategy?

McCarthy struggles, but Atlanta is comfortable keeping Cousins if their demands aren't met.

description: Following a massive H-1B visa fee hike by the US, Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu advises Indian tech professionals in America to return to India and rebuild their careers. Drawing parallels with the Partition, he emphasizes India's growing opportunities and the potential for success, suggesting this reverse migration could strengthen India's tech ecosystem.

title: Emma Raducanu net worth 2025: Check her prize money, endorsements, career
description: British tennis sensation Emma Raducanu, aged 22 in 2025, boasts a $15 million net worth, fueled by prize money and lucrative sponsorships from brands like Nike and Dior. Despite a fluctuating career since her historic 2021 US Open win, where she reached world no. 10, Raducanu continues to compete, reaching the third round of the 2025 Australian Open.

title: Jaden Agassi shares unseen photos with Catherine Holt, celebrates love
description: Jaden Agassi and Catherine Holt celebrated their three-year anniversary on September 20, 2025, sharing heartfelt messages and photos on Instagram. The couple, who adopted a French bulldog named Rocky in June, also attended the US Open women’s singles final.

title: Jobs in AI era: Sam Altman warns, ‘I’m confident these people will lose jobs’
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman predicts AI will soon replace customer service jobs, followed by programmers. He acknowledges the staffing structure of contact centers will shift rapidly. While roles needing human connection, like nursing, are safe, many industry experts are skeptical. Altman also expressed concern about the ethical implications of AI's widespread use, admitting it causes him sleepless nights.

title: Why Molly Qerim left First Take: ESPN cites contract, business factors
description: Molly Qerim's exit from ESPN's First Take wasn't due to controversy, but rather a planned transition as her contract neared expiration. ESPN aimed to broaden Qerim's role beyond the show, while financial considerations, particularly Stephen A. Smith's substantial contract, influenced the decision to seek a more cost-effective co-host. The network is now initiating a casting process to find Qerim's replacement.
